replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=106WnxhG,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-04-16T20:17:58.354+0000)
>
> TSM > C9

On Sunday, it will all be decided. Be ready, Sneaky is coming.
You win the Internet today sir/madam (at least this small corner). Congratulations.
What's the point of this? It's not even close, everyone knows TSM is better than CLG. TSM steps up in playoffs, CLG chokes hard. TSM goes to worlds, CLG sits on the analyst desk.
My expectations are very low when it is about a TSM fanboy trashtalking but you sir/madam managed to be more retarded than anyone else ever did!

Are you joking? Since when lower division means lower IQ? If, for example, I get someone to boost me to a higher league will I automatically become a smarter person? Also, I used the word retarded because you became narrow-minded and ironic comparing 2 lcs teams, divisions have nothing to do with that.
